Smoothies.name: Mango Spinach Smoothie
Smoothies.ingredients: 1 cup of very ripe mango, 1 ripe banana frozen, 2 large handfuls of spinach, 1 inch piece fresh ginger peeled, 1 cup orange juice, ½ cup milk of choice, 1 teaspoon maca powder and 1 teaspoon vanilla.
Smoothies.steps: Combine all ingredients in a high powder blender except the passion fruit. Blend until completely smooth and no chunks remain. Add a handful of ice and blend once more. Pour into a glass and enjoy!

Smoothies.name: Strawberry Coconut Smoothie
Smoothies.ingredients: 1 cup coconut milk, 1 frozen banana sliced, 2 cups frozen strawberries, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract and 1 scoop collagen peptides (optional).
Smoothies.steps: Combine all ingredients in the blender and blend until smooth. Enjoy!

Smoothies.name: Green Smoothie
Smoothies.ingredients: ½ medium peeled avocado, 1 cup spinach, 1 frozen banana, ¼ cup frozen mango or pineapple chunks, 1 tablespoon raw hemp seeds, 1 teaspoon maca powder, 1 scoop protein powder (optional), 1 cup unsweetened nut milk and fresh berries and granola, for garnish.
Smoothies.steps: Combine all ingredients in a blender except the fresh berries and granola. Blend until completely smooth. Pour into a glass and add the fresh berries and granola. Enjoy!

Smoothies.name: Cinnamon Apple Smoothie
Smoothies.ingredients: 2 cups fresh apple chunks, 1 ripe banana, ½ cup Greek yogurt, ¼ cup milk of choice, 8 ice cubes, ½ teaspoon vanilla extract, ¼ teaspoon cinnamon and ½ tablespoon maple syrup.
Smoothies.steps: Combine all ingredients in the blender and blend until smooth. Enjoy!

Smoothies.name: Oatmeal Smoothie
Smoothies.ingredients: ¾ cup Old Fashioned rolled oats, 1 tablespoon peanut butter, ½ cup Greek yogurt, ½ cup milk of choice, 1 ½ ripe bananas, 1 cup frozen pineapple, ¼ teaspoon vanilla extract, ½  teaspoon cinnamon, 8 ice cubes and ½ tablespoon maple syrup.
Smoothies.steps: Combine all ingredients in the blender and blend until smooth. Enjoy!

Smoothies.name: Chocolate Banana Smoothie
Smoothies.ingredients: ½ cup milk of choice, ¼ cup Greek yogurt, 2 medium ripe bananas, 1 ½ cups ice, ¼ cup cocoa powder, 1 ½ tablespoons maple syrup, ½ teaspoon vanilla extract and 1 tablespoon peanut butter.
Smoothies.steps: Combine all ingredients in the blender and blend until smooth. Enjoy!

Smoothies.name: Acai Smoothie
Smoothies.ingredients: 7 ounces frozen unsweetened acai pulp, 1 tablespoon lime juice, ¼ cup cold water, 1 cup pineapple chunks, ½ cup mango, 1 large banana and for the garnish: almond butter, sliced strawberries, diced mango, blueberries, large coconut flakes and fresh mint.
Smoothies.steps: Combine all ingredients in the blender and blend until smooth. Add a of bit colder water if necessary to blend into a puree and garnish. Enjoy!
